TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SymLanguageType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Holds the public GUIDs for language types to be used with the symbol store.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how SymLanguageType is used when calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineDocument%2A>.
[!code-cs[ModuleBuilder_DefineDocument#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.diagnostics.sym_0_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ModuleBuilder_DefineDocument#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.diagnostics.sym_0_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ModuleBuilder_DefineDocument#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.diagnostics.sym_0_1.vb)]
